cars.name: BMW
cars.history: BMW (Bayerische Motoren Werke) is known for its luxury and performance vehicles.

popular_models.name: M-Series
popular_models.info: The BMW M-Series includes high-performance sports cars designed for enthusiasts.

popular_models.name: X-Series
popular_models.info: BMW's luxury SUV lineup offers power, technology, and comfort.

popular_models.name: i-Series
popular_models.info: BMW’s electric vehicle lineup focuses on sustainability and innovation.

cars.name: Mercedes
cars.history: Mercedes-Benz is a pioneer in luxury automotive engineering.

popular_models.name: AMG
popular_models.info: Mercedes-AMG offers high-performance versions of Mercedes-Benz cars.

popular_models.name: S-Class
popular_models.info: A flagship luxury sedan known for its cutting-edge technology and comfort.

popular_models.name: G-Class
popular_models.info: A luxury SUV with off-road capability and an iconic boxy design.

popular_models.name: C-Class
popular_models.info: A compact executive car offering a balance of luxury and sportiness.

cars.name: Lamborghini
cars.history: Lamborghini is known for its high-performance and exotic supercars.

popular_models.name: Huracán
popular_models.info: A V10-powered supercar with aggressive styling and extreme speed.

popular_models.name: Aventador
popular_models.info: Lamborghini’s flagship V12 supercar, known for its extreme performance.

popular_models.name: Revuelto
popular_models.info: Lamborghini’s hybrid supercar featuring a V12 engine combined with electric motors.

cars.name: Porsche
cars.history: Porsche is known for its high-performance sports cars, SUVs, and sedans.

popular_models.info: An iconic rear-engine sports car with timeless design and performance.

popular_models.name: Cayenne
popular_models.info: A high-performance luxury SUV blending sportiness and practicality.

popular_models.name: Taycan
popular_models.info: Porsche’s first all-electric sports car with cutting-edge technology.

cars.name: Ferrari
cars.history: Ferrari is a world-renowned brand known for its high-performance sports cars and racing heritage.

popular_models.name: LaFerrari
popular_models.info: A limited-production hybrid hypercar with a V12 engine and KERS system.

popular_models.name: 488 GTB
popular_models.info: A twin-turbocharged V8 supercar with stunning performance and aerodynamics.

popular_models.name: SF90 Stradale
popular_models.info: A plug-in hybrid supercar that combines extreme power with efficiency.

cars.name: Aston Martin
cars.history: Aston Martin is known for producing luxury sports cars and grand tourers.

popular_models.name: DB11
popular_models.info: A luxury grand tourer with a V8 or V12 engine.

popular_models.name: Vantage
popular_models.info: A high-performance sports car with sleek design and agility.

popular_models.name: Valkyrie
popular_models.info: An extreme hypercar with Formula 1-inspired aerodynamics.

cars.name: Pagani
cars.history: Pagani is a niche brand producing handcrafted hypercars with artful designs.

popular_models.name: Zonda
popular_models.info: A legendary hypercar known for its naturally aspirated V12 engine.

popular_models.name: Huayra
popular_models.info: A twin-turbocharged V12 hypercar with cutting-edge aerodynamics.

popular_models.name: Utopia
popular_models.info: Pagani’s latest hypercar featuring a V12 engine and lightweight design.

cars.name: Toyota
cars.history: Toyota is one of the largest automakers, known for reliability and innovation.

popular_models.name: Supra
popular_models.info: A legendary sports car known for its performance and tuning potential.

popular_models.name: Land Cruiser
popular_models.info: A durable SUV with unmatched off-road capabilities.

popular_models.name: Corolla
popular_models.info: One of the best-selling cars in the world, known for its efficiency and reliability.

cars.name: Rolls-Royce
cars.history: Rolls-Royce is synonymous with luxury, craftsmanship, and prestige.

popular_models.name: Phantom
popular_models.info: The ultimate luxury sedan with unmatched craftsmanship.

popular_models.name: Ghost
popular_models.info: A refined luxury sedan offering power and sophistication.

popular_models.name: Cullinan
popular_models.info: A luxury SUV providing unparalleled comfort and capability.
